compatibility.notes: EPL-2.0 is a weak copyleft license, allowing for compatibility with permissive licenses and certain other weak copyleft licenses. However, it is incompatible with strong copyleft licenses like GPL-3.0.

key_requirements: Contributors grant a patent license for their Contributions.
Recipients must comply with the terms of the EPL-2.0 when distributing the Program or Modified Works.
license.name: EPL-2.0
obligations: Include a copy of the EPL-2.0 license when distributing the Program.
Include copyright notices of the original Contributors.
State changes made to the original Program when creating Modified Works.
